detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Super-oversized jacket in organic cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, diagonal welt front pockets and tabs with a button at the back of the hem.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.

Blouse with long puff sleeves and gathered elastication to create a gently draped effect at the cuffs. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a seam with wide smocking at the hem. Unlined.
Canvas sandals with a decorative knot at the front, tab with a hook and loop fastener and braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a wide neckline and tie detail at the front.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and tapered legs.
Cropped top in cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the top and hem and narrow, ribbed shoulder straps.
Dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with short frilled sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline. Slightly longer at the back.

Backpack in woven fabric that can easily double up as a tote bag. Two handles at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps that unclip at the bottom to be stored in the outer compartment at the back. Hook-and-eye fastening and a zip at the top, a padded laptop sleeve on the inside, a smaller outer compartment on one short side and a large outer compartment with a zip at the front. Lightly padded base. Size approx. 14x30x43 cm.
Shorts in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and back pockets.
3/4-length nylon shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and open back pockets. Low crotch and wide legs with wide elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, striped jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
